name: KissKiss Shine Bloom Lipstick Balm
about: What it is:A high-shine, lightweight, full-coverage lipstick made with hyaluronic acid, shea butter and 95% naturally-derived ingredients for more hydrated, plumped and smoother looking lips..Formulation Type:Lip Balm & Treatment, Lipstick.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing, Plumping.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates the lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This lipstick has a fresh, balm-like texture that smooths and melts onto the lips for a luscious, watery shine finish. It is available in a variety of radiant, versatile, and easy-to-wear shades, each inspired by the color of a flower.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates the lips..-Winter Rose Extract: Softens the appearance of lips. .-Shea Butter: Provides long-lasting comfort. ..Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Squalane, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax Extract, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Isostearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Commiphora Mukul Resin Extract, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Trihydroxystearin, Propyl Gallate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Benzyl Alcohol, Glucomannan, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prime your lips with KissKiss Liplift Lipstick Primer (sold separately) or KissKiss Roselip Tinted Lip Balm (sold separately)..-Apply to lips, and build desired coverage with additional application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lipstick - its smooth going on, lasts a long tiime and keeps my lips soft and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed. I used to love Guerlain, but the updated case feels and sounds plasticky and cheap.. itu2019s disappointing from such a luxury brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want every color of this gorgeous line. Feel great and have a lot of staying power.

reviews.review_title: No shine or gloss as described
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The description is high shine glossy but the lip balm is not glossy at all. The eternal rose goes on much pinker than expected. I was looking for a bit deeper colour. I wouldn't recommend it if you are looking for high shine or glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Iu2019m in love with the packaging first off itu2019s so smooth and silky luxe gold! The color looked a little dark at first but itu2019s not hyper pigmented. The scent is amazing like classic Guerlain. It lasted on my lips all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lipstick Iu2019ve tried in a long time! I bought it 3 months ago and Iu2019m almost done of my tube  since I wear it everyday. The texture is hydrating without feeling greasy and I can apply it without a lipliner & it doesnu2019t smudge all day. It has way longer lasting power than other lipsticks on the market with similar claims/formulas. Throughout the day it loses its initial shine when you apply it, however I find it lasts longer because of this. The color Dahlia Kiss is absolutely perfect if you love a good warm, peachy nude.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought in Cherry Kiss.  I wrote a review previously on Peach Kiss. I still love the formula, and I love how it makes my lips look. However, I think they mislabeled the lipstick I purchased. Itu2019s supposed to be a u201cradiant burlat cherryu201d and the swatches in the pictures looked far darker than it is. It looks closer to Poppy Kiss from the pictures. I still wear it but I was hoping for the darker red shown.

reviews.review_title: smells really bad and not glossy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i bought mine from nordstrom but i returned it. it smells like strong rose perfume (like loreal lipsticks). i was expecting a glossy sheer lipstick but it doesnt really have much shine. the color was pretty but a little light for me. the smell was too unbearable. i prefer the chanel ones better. not worth the $40

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought shade 258 and love it.  With one swipe there is a barest of color coverage but with two swipes the color becomes more pink.  The fragrance is there but it does go away after a little while.  If the fragrance is bothersome a sort of dupe would be Clinique dramatically different lipstick in bare or innocently..shades 1 or 2.  I think this Guerlain lipstick is wonderful and while giving color coverage it has today's modern look approaching nude shades.  Nude doesn't work for my paler skin tone so this is a great choice for me....nude but with color coverage.  Unfortunately this line could use more pinks in it...a shade brighter, a shade more nude and a really brighter shade of pink.  I think with four or five pinks to choose from it would be helpful for a variety of skin tones.  This is the only shade I have tried so far.  With the price point it is a difficult line to just haphazardly experiment with color and risk disappointment.  MAC cosmetics has a more forgiving price when experimenting with different colors.  This Guerlain lipstick applies smooth as silk and for my dry lips that is a big plus.  It does not look dry at all on and just glides over the lips making application so easy.  I didn't even use lipliner with it.  Just LOVE it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this item knowing that this is a balm and splurged based on the results I thought I'd get from using it. Did it hydrate my lips? No. Did I return it? Yes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought 319 Peach Kiss. Itu2019s absolutely beautiful. It was very comfortable to wear, buildable pigment, and didnu2019t dry out my lips since itu2019s a balm, but itu2019s not long-lasting for that reason. You will have to reapply. It has almost a satin-like finish, so it wonu2019t be super glossy if thatu2019s what youu2019re looking for. Also, it somehow made my lips look bigger? Iu2019m still shook. Iu2019m definitely buying more colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So moisturizing and balmy. Not sticky. The color is opaque but buildable which I prefer. I am not a fan of matte lip products. The only drawback people may have is the very light floral scent.  This color gives me just enough color so I donu2019t look so washed out.

reviews.review_title: Not the same colour as shown
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was somewhat disappointed in this product. The color was not the same at all as depicted in the description. I was expecting a delicate pink color. Instead it was a bright pink. It was definitely a lip balm and went on nicely and moisturizing. I will be taking it back as I did not get the color that was in the picture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipstick. I'm very picky when it comes to lipstick. I do not like matte formulas at all. This formula is nice and creamy on the lips. It is sort of sheer, so, you can apply as much as you want to. And you will want to. I normally have a price limit on lipstick but because of the 20% off sale, I made an exception and treated myself. I'm very happy I did and I probably will buy another shade in the future with or without the discount. I give it two very enthusiastic thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the 2nd shade of this product I've tried. The formula is super hydrating and creamy, without feeling oily or sticky. This shade looked a little different on the lips than how its described. Shows up as more of a sheer pinky red on my lips. I couldn't get full opacity, even with 3 coats. Not a complaint, just an observation. Still highly recommend this formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing formula and it's 95% natural! The PH adjustable shade is great and goes smoothly on the lips. It's so hydrating and still pigmented for a shine lipstick. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is super hydrating. It has a smooth, creamy texture, but better staying power than similar formulas. This shade is a soft rosy pink, that gives just a tiny bit of shine. The color is also very buildable. Has a soft floral scent, but doesn't linger after applying. I've ordered 2 more shades. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: This is the balm you want to get!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I've been looking at all the new balms on Sephora to try one during the sale. This one has Squalane as the 2nd ingredient! That's a super moisturizing and it is on the lips. The color is really nice and you get a good amount of product. Just try one, especially when you can get it on sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Both the balm texture and colour payoff are amazing!! So glad Guerlain was able to renew this staple into a clean and natural formula, worth every penny!
